main.name: Jane Reforma
main.AboutDescription: Web Developer with 5 years of experience in the development of innovative static and dynamic websites using current W3C standards of coding. Additional experience in the use of content management systems to allow clients to update content on their websites. Very strong organisational, presentational, and communication skills to help plan out and pitch different web user interface styles that suited the clientâ€™s needs.
